property.name: MOUSE_UP
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the mouse is released after a click.

property.name: MOUSE_DOWN
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the mouse button is clicked &#40;without being released).

property.name: MOUSE_ENTER
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the mouse pointer enters the area defined by the bounding box of the object.

property.name: MOUSE_EXIT
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the mouse pointer exits the area defined by the bounding box of the object.

property.name: ON_FOCUS
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the object receives focus, either through a mouse action or by pressing the Tab key.

property.name: ON_BLUR
property.shortdesc: Triggers the behavior when the focus moves to a different interactive object.
